original_text: But his father will die for his own sin, because he practiced extortion, robbed his brother and did what was wrong among his people.
korean_text: 그의 아버지는 심히 포학하여 그 동족을 강탈하고 백성들 중에서 선을 행하지 아니하였으므로 그는 그의 죄악으로 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: But his father will die for his own sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 아버지는 자신의 죄로 죽을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and did what was wrong among his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 백성들 중에서 잘못된 일을 했습니다
